tier_verification: Several claims (C7, C8, C10) appear to describe business model innovation and new revenue stream creation rather than functional optimization. These may be misclassified and should be considered for tier 1. The remaining claims focus on development efficiency but lack the specific metrics needed for strong tier 1 cases.
